"...Harriet! What have you done?!": "The world merely responded to the calls it heard. To awaken gods, to reawaken heroes. Those were all wishes of humans living here."
"Wishes of humans...! Of those pigs that wallow in their own deceit and desires?!"
"That is not true of all of them. I see that now thanks to my father, my brother... and of course, thanks to the Guardian."
"Accept it, Elmir. Humans will not fall to despair so easily... And neither will I."
"You think yourself human? You are a vessel!"
"I am human. I am Harriet."
"That is what everyone believes... That is what the Guardian believes... So I will not abandon my humanity."
"Grh...! All of this hope is your fault, Guardian!"
"<%me>! Huge energy readings dead ahead!"
"A whole line-up of Dark Falz... This is one heck of a welcoming party... And we were so close to the cocoon...!"
"Hah, don't even think about backin' down from this!"
"My, looking down on others like that is so disgraceful."
"I refuse to believe I ever looked anything like that thing. I'm all for squashing it."
"You just want someone to play with, don'tcha? Then you can have lots and lots of fun with me."
"I'll play as much as you want. Until you're broken into iiitty-bitty pieces."
"You're going to help?"
"Can you take care of them?"
"I just wanna clobber anyone that pisses me off! Don't get all sappy on me!"
"Think of this as you will. However, our pact only lasts so long as Harriet does."
"Don't you just love kicking over the blocks of spoiled children who think they own the world?"
"We won't let him get away with treating us like a toy."
"Yeah. That was mean. He's really gonna get it for that."
"Go, failure! Rescue my masterpiece!"
"Whoa there, where d'ya think you're lookin'!"
"Don't you wanna play with me?"
"Lots and lots, okay?"
"Hahah, you dare avert your gaze from the beauty standing before you?"
"...Well then. Why don't I dispose of this poorly crafted plaything."
"Margareta"
"Flo"
"Frau"
